frontmatter.title: MIT Battlecode: How my team won $1250 coding a strategy game AI in Python in two weeks
frontmatter.description: In 2019, I was a part of two-man team 'useless bot please ignore' that made it to the finals of MIT's longest running annual coding competition. I learned a lot about programming, but also my stress limits and the effects prolonged stress can have on the psyche.
